amendment.description: To require a report on the use of alternative fuels by the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4532 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4532 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6386) To require a report on the use of alternative fuels by the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4532 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4532 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
